comments:
With Test Log Viewer opened, restart eclipse. The editor fails to be opened. Close and reopen the editor works fine. Also if the Test log viewer was not the editor at the front when restarting, it also works when switch focus to it.

Stack Trace:

I have seen this problem too.  

Bianca, please assign a sizing.  We will target this defect early in i3 since we want to limit changes in TP1 to blocking issues.

This problem is caused by defect 127277, in that the org.eclipse.hyades.test.core plug-in class is now not called by the org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui plug-in class to load the resource bundle manager.  As a result, the org.eclipse.hyades.test.core plug-in is not loaded before the org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui plug-in (e.g. opening the Test Log view) since the org.eclipse.hyades.test.core plug-in is lazy-loaded and the resource factories are not initialized and the resource cannot be loaded.

Plug-in classes for the following plug-ins checked-in to CVS (HEAD):

org.eclipse.hyades.test.core
org.eclipse.hyades.test.tools.core
org.eclipse.hyades.test.ui
org.eclipse.hyades.test.tools.ui
Reporter: Please verify and close in preparation for shutting down the TPTP 4.4 release.  Thanks.
